ISSUE.TITLE: request help: Where Can I Find More APISIX Variables ?
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Issue description I want to define my own log format. But I can't find enough APISIX Variables. I only find this:https://apisix.apache.org/docs/apisix/plugins/kafka-logger Where Can I Find More APISIX Variables ? ### Environment - apisix version (cmd: `apisix version`): 2.11.0 Using Official Docker Image.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: feat: add separately install support for `install-dependencies.sh` (#5979)
